Title: Losing Will
Writer: Julian Faid (story), Arlen Konopaki (story), Mike Robertson (story), Joe Vanderhelm (story)
Actors: Arlen Konopaki, Joe Vanderhelm, Julian Faid, Kristi Hansen
Plot: After suffering paralysis due to a car accident, a young man informs his two best friends that he wants them to take him on a road trip and at the end of it, kill him.
